channel.title: Refined power holiday wreath on windmill
channel.description: I never ever enabled the holiday stuff in the game. But I am still getting the wreath on the windmills. Is this related to the bug where the sleigh is still shown on the button used for researching stuff in the Hub?

item.title: Refined power holiday wreath on windmill
item.dc:creator: @JamieRCHI Jamie
item.description:
@JamieRCHI wrote:

I never ever enabled the holiday stuff in the game.
But I am still getting the wreath on the windmills.
Is this related to the bug where the sleigh is still shown on the button used for researching stuff in the Hub?

Read full topic
